definitions.definition: An element of decoration ; that which embellishes or adorns.
A musical flourish that is unnecessary to the overall melodic or harmonic line, but serves to decorate that line.
The articles used in church services .
A characteristic that has a decorative function (typically in order to attract a mate)

main_definition: An element of decoration ; that which embellishes or adorns.
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A musical flourish that is unnecessary to the overall melodic or harmonic line, but serves to decorate that line.
( Christianity , in the plural ) The articles used in church services .
( biology ) A characteristic that has a decorative function (typically in order to attract a mate)
